title: Extreme Life Makeover
description: Have you felt low lately? Tired? Frustrated with how things are now? Are you ready for a change? Maybe you need a makeover. An extreme life makeover. As Christians, it's time for us to make the necessary changes to enjoy the life Christ died to give us... the abundant life that overflows with the love, joy and peace of God. If that's what you need, then this book is for you!
author: Julie Rice
